name: WhiteNoiseSoundsforSleepandRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, open White Noise”
”Alexa, start White Noise”
”Alexa, launch White Noise”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise
des:
Let the White Noise Sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"White Noise Sounds for Sleep and Relaxation" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties. Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.

HOW TO USE:

Enable "White Noise Sounds for Sleep and Relaxation" by clicking the "enable" button above, then say "Alexa, open White Noise".

By default, the sound will play for 1 hour. White Noise sounds will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."


PRO MEMBERSHIP FEATURES:

+ HD audio quality
+ Longer sound loop (no sound gaps, Alexa will play until you say "Stop", instead of 1 hour)

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:
Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Sleep Sounds.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
